# Sodium silicate and hexametaphosphate promote the release of (oxyhydr)oxide nanoparticles from corroding iron  

This repository contains the R code and other materials for the paper "Sodium silicate and hexametaphosphate promote the release of (oxyhydr)oxide nanoparticles from corroding iron" (soon to be available as a preprint).
